title: Caspar Collins; the life and exploits of an Indian fighter of the sixties, by Agnes Wright Spring, with a foreword by Maj. Gen. Hugh L. Scott ... together with Caspar Collins' letters and drawings, and various photographs and documents connected with his career.
author: Spring, Agnes Wright, 1894-1988.
